title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Quantum Disaster
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A physics graduate student experimenting with a black-market quantum device accidentally shifts himself into a parallel timeline where he never existed, causing reality to violently reject his presence and erase him from existence.

death_teaser: Some timelines aren't meant to have you in them.
